name: Wedding Stylist: Makeup Bride
description:
Do you want to play as a fashion designer who loves playing fashion stylist and dress up games for girls? Wouldn’t it be amazing if you had an opportunity to give a bridal makeover to a bride?

Play with the latest wedding dresses, hairstyles, wedding rings, makeup, trends, and fashion ideas with the Wedding Stylist game.

Explore the unique wedding gown ideas and hundreds of best Wedding Hairstyles for any kind of hair. Play with different bride characters and get ready to give them a fashion makeover with this unique dress up and makeup game based on a wedding theme.

On the Wedding Stylist app, you will find a huge collection of wedding dresses, wedding hairstyles, wedding accessories, wedding rings, wedding shoes, and everything that you need to help the bride look the best on her wedding day. This bridal makeover game will let you explore Wedding Outfits with perfect Wedding Makeup and styling shoes or accessories. Prepare the character for a fashion show.

Are you still looking for features that make Wedding Stylist the best among all bridal fashion and dress up games for girls? Below are some incredible features of this fashion stylist game.
● Play as a fashion stylist with different bride characters to give them a makeover
● Play as a fashion designer and prepare the character for a fashion show
● Choose from a wide range of wedding outfits, accessories, makeups and shoes
● Claim diamonds to unlock new accessories to help with your stylist journey
● Compete with other fashion lovers and fashion stylists
● Complete secret missions as a fashion designer to win a diamond and tickets to join stunning events and fashion shows
● Do wedding dress up, make-up with hairstyles, lips, cheeks, and more

All these features on this bridal fashion game are available for free. So, what are you waiting for? Download this incredible bride fashion and make-up game and experience the best among all dress up games for girls
